name: GeoTrivia
description:
This is a single player shooter/trivia game!

MADE IN 72 HOURS FOR GEOJAM 2022

In GeoTrivia you fight off circles(fast moving bombs that will explode when they get close), cubes(slow moving and slow shooting but does lots of damage), triangles(pretty much the same as the cube but faster and less damage).

Fight off hordes of enemies using well crafted and fluid movement mechanics. It has wallrunning which is cool so yeah.
